definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: Shows how to open a port and communicate wih other computers.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序演示了打开一个端口，并和其它计算机通信。

sentences.english: Research will need to be done for each power point video presentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究将需要为每个电源点的视频演示完成。

sentences.english: They didn’t call the PO after the demo to check his feedback.
sentences.chinese: 他们在演示后甚至不会去给PO打电话了解反馈。

sentences.english: For patch updates and to play a fast demo, see below.
sentences.chinese: 修补更新和发挥快速演示，见下文。

sentences.english: The small demo program shows how to use the oscilloscope control.
sentences.chinese: 小演示程序演示了如何使用示波器的控制。

sentences.english: The small demo program shows how to use the oscilloscope control.
sentences.chinese: 小演示程序演示了如何使用示波器的控制。

sentences.english: Part of your audience wants to see the pianist and presenter.
sentences.chinese: 一部分观众想要看到钢琴演奏者和演示者。

sentences.english: This salesman demonstrated how to cook with a pressure cooker.
sentences.chinese: 这个倾销员当众演示如何用压力锅煮东西。

sentences.english: He planned to demonstrate the behaviour at the ceremony using puppets.
sentences.chinese: 他计划在典礼上利用木偶来演示果蝠的这种行为。

sentences.english: You can imagine that this demo would only be the first step in providing visibility.
sentences.chinese: 可以想象得到，本演示仅仅是提供可见性的第一步。

sentences.english: It is achieved that demonstrating phenomenon is obvious if the device is working at slow-speed.
sentences.chinese: 胶印机示教装置在低速运行时，演示现象明显。

sentences.english: Then, the comprehensive analysis was carried on by the experimental results and principle of heat pipe technique.
sentences.chinese: 以演示试验为根据，结合热管技术原理进行综合分析。

sentences.english: This example program demonstrates how to use a dynamic recordset.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序演示了如何使用一个动态记录集。

sentences.english: We chose the latter for demonstration purposes for the article.
sentences.chinese: 基于本文的演示目的，我们选择了后者。

sentences.english: This project generates a simple, flicker-free 2D animation demo. It loads two pictures—a background (big one) and a foreground (small one).
sentences.chinese: 这个项目生成一个简单的，不闪烁的2D动画演示。

sentences.english: Working together with one or more people to put together a killer presentation?
sentences.chinese: 想要和几个哥们一起捣鼓出一个杀手级的演示文稿？

definition: to reveal/to display/to show/to exhibit sth
imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
course of study/teaching module at university/tutorial
to demonstrate/to show how to do sth/demonstration/a model example
to observe and emulate/to study (esp. following sb's example)
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram
to try sth out/to be on probation
